section.heading: Duties of the Deputy Auditor for Public Safety.
section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 24-345: § 301 of D.C. Law 24-345 provided that the creation of this section by § 138 of D.C. Law 24-345 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
